piliyandala makandana, sankalpa wiharaye abhinawa sambuddha mandiraya wiwrutha kirime maha pinkam mayi masa 13 paswaru 3 ta kathanayaka chamal rajapaksha mathithuma shri dalada maligawe diyawadana nilame pradip nilanga dala mathithumage saha parlimenthu manthri sajith pe්ramadasa mahathageda sahabhagithwayen pawathwe.malwathu parshwaye anunayaka dillukumbaure shri medhankara wimaladhamma nahimi, pahamune sumangala nahimi athulu garuthara nahimiwarunge aashirwadayen pinkam pawathwe.me nimiththen sathi pirith deshanaya mayi 3 sita mayi 10 dakwa pawathwena athara pirith anushasanawa puhulwalle dharmarama himiyan pawathwana athara mema pinkam malawa mayi masa 26 dakwa pawathwe.wiharadhipathi uggoda dhamminda himiyange anushasana paridi mema pinkam malawa sanwidhanaya kara atha.
